body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Tennessee native. Married to Mary A. Gater Belt in Crittenden County, Kentucky on April 23, 1854. Farmer in Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 15th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from October 6, 1862 to October 29, 1863.
